summary: Race descriptions are now telling the truth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod changes the descriptions of vanilla races.[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]I'm a Perkumus user, I don't know if it will work for Requiem users.[/size]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatic: Manager should do the magic.
Manual: Drag it to your data folder.[/size]
[/font]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0N2hcAQ.png[/img][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
